instructions: Ensure your Android device is connected to the same Wi-fi network as your Chromecast. In the URL bar, type " about:config " and press Enter . Search for the content you would like to cast. Not all content is supported by the Chromecast, therefore, you have to ensure the content you want to cast is supported . Once you've found your content, tap the Cast icon in the video player for the content you're playing. If the Cast icon is not in the video, it might be next to the URL next to Firefox's home icon. Tap the device you'd like to cast your content to. Once the content starts to play you'll see where is it cast and the option to pause/stop it on your Android device. Enjoy from your content using Firefox on your Android device
